definitions.text: draw into the mouth by creating a practical vacuum in the mouth
examples: suck the poison from the place where the snake bit
the baby sucked on the mother's breast

definitions.text: draw something in by or as if by a vacuum
examples: Mud was sucking at her feet

definitions.text: attract by using an inexorable force, inducement, etc.
examples: The current boom in the economy sucked many workers in from abroad

definitions.text: provide sexual gratification through oral stimulation

examples: She drew strength from the minister's words
You cannot nurse your baby in public in some places
